required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Open Label Randomized Clinical Study to Promote a Healthy Lifestyle in Medical Students
clinical_study.official_title: Personalized Nutrition, Physical Activity and Therapy to Modulate Gut Microbiota: a Randomized Clinical Study to Promote a Healthy Lifestyle in Students

collaborator.agency: Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv

brief_summary.textblock: The main medical and social purpose of the project "It's trendy to be healthy!" is the promotion of healthy lifestyles and healthy eating among student youth. The relevance of this project is beyond doubt, as the WHO called obesity a non-communicable epidemic, and according to research by the Jane Schiller University of Germany (Germany), as mentioned above, Ukraine topped the list of the countries with high mortality due to malnutrition

primary_outcome.description: RAS is consists of 30 questions and is divided into five subgroups, according to the scores: 0-24: very insecure; 25-48: rather unsure than confident; 49-72: average confidence value; 73-96: self-confident and 97-120: overconfident.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in test "Diagnosis of situational and personal anxiety"
primary_outcome.description: Test " Diagnosis of situational and personal anxiety" by Ch. D. Spielberger consists of 20 statements that refer to anxiety as a state (state of anxiety, reactive (RA) or situational anxiety (SA)) and 20 statements to define anxiety as a disposition, personality traits (anxiety property).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: weight in kg and height in meters will be combined to report BMI in kg/m^2

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: muscle mass (kg) using electronic scales-analyzers of body composition Tanita Scale BC-601

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: fat content (%) using electronic scales-analyzers of body composition Tanita Scale BC-601

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Blood pressure is measured from the right hand while sitting with the help of a mercury barometer "OMRON". Blood pressure is taken twice at a 5-minute interval while seated for 5 minutes.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 45 and 90 days compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Blood pressure is measured from the right hand while sitting with the help of a mercury barometer "OMRON". Blood pressure is taken twice at a 5-minute interval while seated for 5 minutes.

arm_group.description: 3-month course of individually selected nutrition program developed by a gastroenterologist-nutritionist and modification of physical activity (8000-10000 steps daily)

additionally to previous group recieved treatment with synbiotic (Fructooligosaccharides+Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG ATCC 53103) and vitamin D3 - 2000 IU. The students were instructed to take vitamin D3 and synbiotic sachets twice a day for 3 months.

intervention.intervention_name: nutrition program and modification of physical activity
intervention.description: nutrition program developed by a gastroenterologist-nutritionist and modification of physical activity (8000-10000 steps daily)

intervention.intervention_name: synbiotic (Fructooligosaccharides+Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG ATCC 53103, 4.0Ñ…109 colony forming units - CFU)
intervention.description: one synbiotic sachet (3g), BID, for 3 month traetment
vitamin D3, oral, 2000IU BID, for 3 month treatment
